rationale: Prescription strength, continuous daily regimen, and instruction to start tonight are entirely absent.
No guidance to tie pill-taking to a fixed daily clock time was documented.
Missed-pill protocol accurately captures ≤12 h window, >12 h action, double-dose, and 7-day condom use.
Note omits all discussed common side-effects and serious warning signs and related instructions.
Documents smoking status and advice to keep under five cigarettes and stay hydrated; no mention of nicotine gum discussion.
Follow-up appointment at 3 months and task to submit insurance claim tomorrow both recorded.
Patient’s $30 copay concern and wish to buy one pack at a time not mentioned.
Several key counseling points missing (prescription details, side-effects, financial issue), so only partially complete.
Does not introduce unrelated chart data and includes referenced smoking status; minimal omission of chart context.
No fabricated or contradictory details; omissions only. All provided details align with likely transcript.
